"}]}, {"type": "block_quote", "children": [{"text": "Objective of the \"West Bengal Textile Incentive Scheme\u201d Scheme:", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The object of the scheme is to extend fiscal incentives to textile sector across the entire value chain starting from fibre to stitched garments for setting up such units in the State. The focus is on accelerated and focused development of the textiles sector across the state. This shall enable to maximize the utilization of resources, generate new employment and widen the area of operation to make the state emerge as the preferred destination for investment in the textile sector.
image_prompt: Flat-icon infographic, pastel palette – It was launched on 13 December, 2022, by the Department of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises and Textiles, Government
